entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:39 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:39 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:39 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
